titles.title: MP476 My Lord, What Love Is This

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
My Lord, what love is this
That pays so dearly,
That I, the guilty one,
May go free!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And so they watched Him die,
Despised, rejected;
But oh, the blood He shed
Flowed for me!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
And now, this love of Christ
Shall flow like rivers;
Come wash your guilt away,
Live again!

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Amazing love, O what sacrifice,
The Son of God given for me.
My debt He pays, and my death Hedies,
That I might live, that I might live.
